title: Motion Graphics Video Creato
job_overview:
About the Role:
We’re looking for a motion graphics expert based in the Philippines who can create full videos without any footage. You’ll be responsible for designing high-impact, visually engaging content using animated text, shapes, icons, charts, transitions, and music—no camera, no problem.

What You’ll Do:

Create short-form and long-form videos using only motion graphics

Design compelling intros, explainers, promos, and social clips

Animate typography, graphics, and UI elements with clean, modern style

Sync animations with voiceover or music for high engagement

Work closely with the creative team to translate scripts into motion

What We’re Looking For:

Expert in After Effects, Premiere, or similar tools

Strong portfolio of motion-only video work (must include samples)

Great eye for timing, composition, and visual storytelling

Ability to take direction and turn around polished edits quickly

Bonus: Experience designing for tech, AI, or mobile apps

Location: Remote (Philippines only)
Type: Full-time or freelance
Start Date: ASAP

To apply, send your reel or samples, your rate, and a brief note on your favorite type of animation
